Matrix Class Reference

a 4*4 float transformation matrix many operations are designed to not use itermediate or stack return values for speed. More...

#include <matrix.h>

Detailed Description

a 4*4 float transformation matrix many operations are designed to not use itermediate or stack return values for speed.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Matrix::Contents

Enumeration values:
HAS_TRANSLATION   matrix has translation part.
HAS_SCALE   a scale part.
HAS_NEGATIVE_SCALE   negative scale.
HAS_ROTATION   any rotation.
HAS_PERSPECTIVE   perspective part.
HAS_NON_UNIFORM_SCALE   non uniform scale.
HAS_ANY_SCALE  
HAS_ANY_TRANSFORM  
HAS_ANYTHING
